item.rel_title: The clinical and epidemiological features and hints of 82 confirmed COVID-19 pediatric cases aged 0-16 in Wuhan, China
item.rel_abs: Although COVID-19 pediatric patients just account for 1% of the overall cases, they are nonnegligible invisible infection sources. We quantitatively analyzed the clinical and epidemiological features of 82 confirmed cases aged 0-16 admitted to Wuhan Children's Hospital, which are expected to shed some lights onto the pediatric diagnosis and therapy.
item.rel_authors: Yu, H.; Cai, Q.; Dai, X.; Liu, X.; Sun, H.
